name: Covertly Overthrowing PSN-Controlled Systems
description: Silently dismantling PSN-run institutions and power structures from within.

cards.title: Undermining PSN Leadership
cards.description: Weakening PSN leadership through controlled instability.
bulletpoints: Identifying weak points in their command structure.
Exploiting internal rivalries to create power struggles.
Using infiltration tactics to subtly redirect their operations toward failure.

cards.title: Replacing PSN-Controlled Narratives
cards.description: Building alternative information systems to replace PSN influence.
bulletpoints: Developing independent media to counter their propaganda.
Using grassroots education to inoculate communities against PSN rhetoric.
Leveraging decentralized networks to prevent narrative monopolization.

cards.title: Constructing Resilient Social Structures
bulletpoints: Developing decentralized systems that are immune to PSN control.
Building alliances that reinforce independent thought and resistance.
Leveraging technology to prevent mass influence and psychological subjugation.
